entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Create an dynamic MockObject #59729
  • FindPythonWindows does not error gracefully #59724
  • CoreCLR's debug/checked last error trashing leaks in non-P/Invoke scenarios #59721
  • Generate fast-path serialize logic for nullable structs #59719
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: new `TypeLocal` class to get/set arbitrary values based on a supplied Generic Type #59718
  • Add tooling to automate signing iOS/tvOS apps when running tests locally #59717
    7.0.0
  • Single-file executables should be valid executables according to the platform file spec #59715
    7.0.0
  • JIT: crc32 bad codegen for contained constant address #59714
    7.0.0
  • Interop+AppleCrypto+AppleCFErrorCryptographicException: The operation couldn’t be completed. (Internal CSSM error error -2147416032 - Internal error #80010820 at SignTransform_block_invoke... #59703
  • Linux: Instantiating a LdapConnection with a server string including a port number in .Net6.0-rc1 System.DirectoryServices.Protocols throws later an error at a SendRequest #59701
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Type #59704
  • Regression in File.PreallocationSize #59705
  • Dotnet command cannot be found after installing .NET 6.0.100-rc.2.21476.4-osx-x64.pkg on Apple M1. #59691
  • Issue with HttpClient using it on PUT/POST verbs on aspnet core 2.1 #59692
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeGeneratorTests\\TypeGeneratorTest1345\\Generated1345\\Generated1345.cmd #59690
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\CLR-x86-JIT\\V1-M09.5-PDC\\b12274\\b12274\\b12274.cmd #59689
  • [wasm] native functions with varargs are not supported #59685
    7.0.0

Closed

  • ResourceManager.GetResourceSet returns different results if GetString is used #58855
    7.0.0
  • XmlSerializer tries to use Reflection.Emit even if RuntimeFeature.IsDynamicCodeSupported is false #59167
    6.0.0
  • Running 'dotnet-serve' with .NET 6.0 RC1 ARM on an Apple M1: Nothing happens #59618
    Future
  • Right shift of specific BigInteger values is producing incorrect results #59509
  • C# string formatting with negative numbers are not working as expected in net5.0 #59570
  • Test failure System.ServiceProcess.Tests.ServiceBaseTests.PropagateExceptionFromOnStart #59297
    7.0.0
  • Remove string allocations in `VersionConverter` in `System.Text.Json` #55179
    7.0.0
  • DependencyInjection doesn't support value type services #42160
    Future
  • Dependency Injection using ILEmit is generating additional MSIL nop operations in the DynamicMethod #59624
    Future
  • .Net 6 Host High CPU Issuie #59693
  • [mono] iOS - Size reduction: optimize corelib runtime type checks in generic functions #54849
    7.0.0
  • Dictionary concurrency behaviour #59688
  • Exception in test infrastructure - System.InvalidOperationException: Collection was modified after the enumerator was instantiated #11063
    Future
  • [wasm] Unable to evaluate in Blazor Wasm #59694
  • Hot Reload in Blazor not working with Authorization-Middleware #59481
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: bool HashSet<T>.Update(T value, out T actual) #59468

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Revert bind single elements to array in configuration binder #59733
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • fixes to get Quic working on macOS #59728
    os-mac-os-x, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] Fix Time Zone when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #59727
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 6.0.0
  • Only run source-index on main branch. #59725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add initial codespaces support for dotnet/runtime #59723
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Build one MonoTargetsTasks assembly for Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoTargets.Sdk pack #59720
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Refactor `fgMorphCast` #59713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Deduplicate epilogs in Type.operator== #59711
  • Update CODEOWNERS to myself to JSON owners #59709
    area-Meta
  • Fix assert for chain of ASG nodes after tail-calls #59708
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Treat 'abstract' properties the same as 'virtual' for src-gen #59707
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugger after ts changes #59702
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][jit] Eliminate some AOTCONST instructions if they are not used. #59699
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Revise descriptions of VS workloads, and add missing ones #59698
    area-Build-mono
  • FileSystem.Unix: improve CopyFile. #59695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

Merged

  • Revert bind single elements to array in configuration binder #59716
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix nullable warning in HttpConnectionBase #59722
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix Time Zone when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #59710
    area-System.Runtime, 6.0.0
  • Fix race condition in ServiceProcess tests #59676
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Turn on XHarness telemetry for mono runtime tests #59646
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make Utf16CharMarshaller pin ref parameters #59700
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fix null termination for generated marshalling of read-only ref string #59726
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect tracking of sign bit #59525
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add Compiler record to PDB files in Crossgen2 #59686
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Reduce allocations in VersionConverter #55564
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Check Options validations length instead of null #58157
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: allow suppressing some dumps or parts of dumps #59299
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dependency Injection support for ValueTypes as Services #59625
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Dependency Injection SAVE_ASSEMBLIES code clean up #59684
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Removing unused CallSiteKind items from Dependency Injection #59687
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Prevent cache from being resized #59607
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Update MonoVM diagnostics-tracing doc with new features and scenarios. #58620
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, area-Tracing-mono
  • Remove redundant checks #59310
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Using optimized ILGenerator.Emit function in Dependency Injection #59680
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Eliminate some type comparisons in gshared methods. #59543
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fewer AddressExposedReason::TOO_CONSERVATIVE #59429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59387
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable running analyzers on DllImportGenerator and Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration #59683
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Don't print error message when Browser is closed while debugging #59664
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • Leverage `cwde` and `cdqe` for sign extensions on xarch #56172
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add PEM exports to certificates #59674
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • Dllimport generator build and test fixes #59658
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • [wasm] Build improvements based on feedback #59391
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • FileStream.Unix: improve DeleteOnClose when FileShare.None. #55327
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Build improvements based on feedback #59671
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update ConfigurationManager #59600
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Implement `GT_MUL_LONG` for ARM64 #57926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Stop retyping RHSes to byrefs on type mismatch #58297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] More typescript conversion #59655
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix for GitHub issue #59432 and the corresponding regression test #59663
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Antigen: Change Antigen's helixqueue to public #59657
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Reusing buffer to avoid allocate every debugger message #59480
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Arm: Include BBJ_ALWAYS blocks in dominance calculation #59376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix few more QUIC tests that can hang #59682
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Adjust SkipOnCoreClr for Match_ExcessPrefix test #59564
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Refactoring XmlReader{Async} #59337
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prefer readonlyspan properties over readonly array fields #59670
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Remove _validator field from ObjectCollection #59589
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • System.Text.Json using source generators produces "Method not found" #1498

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add back "quick" optimization to SymbolicRegexRunner #1605
  • Fix stack overflow in SymbolicRegexNode.GetFixedLength #1604
  • Merge main into feature/regexsrm #1603

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Add SSA form #1598
  • Exploration support of symbolic regex into symbolic NFA #1602

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to compile my .net core app using build #21498
    Discussion

Closed

  • Targeting pack "path" is in consistent #12098
    6.0.1xx
  • Clean up and refactoring ProcessFrameworkReferences #12117
    6.0.1xx
  • .NET 5: Unable to install some .NET tools (dotnet tool install) #14547
    Backlog
  • Remove workaround for pinning AssemblyVersion for templatelocator #14801
    6.0.1xx
  • [ARM32]With .NET 6 Preview1, running application failed with error required library libhostfxr.so could not be found. #15757
    6.0.1xx
  • Publish of WPF app fails for ARM64 - "There was no runtime pack" #15972
  • VS 16.10 build regression - MSB4023: Cannot evaluate the item metadata "%(FullPath)". #17938
    6.0.1xx
  • dotnet publish hangs on Linux build #18484
  • [Loc]the output about help description in CLI are unlocalized on locale OS. #18934
  • [Daily SDK build] Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver breaks VS2019 and VS2022 when trying to load any projects. #19015
    6.0.1xx
  • "dotnet workload update --print-download-link-only" command fails #19691
  • `dotnet --help` and `dotnet help` don't list `dotnet workload` commands #21463

PullRequests

Created

  • Add OS and Process Architecture #21517
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1391668 #21516
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1391498 #21514
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1391342 #21509
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Fixes pack incrementalism issue #21506
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.source-build dependency #21505
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21487
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove sql-cache from dotnet help #21464
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Rename DeploymentReleasesVersion Versions.props entry. #21502
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clean up client/server shutdown #21390
    Area-Workloads
  • [Backport][Blazor] from main: BlazorWasm: Fix including the target assembly #21453
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21422
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix failure when manifest that is expected to exist isn't found #21358
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ChangeToNoGeneratedDocumentsUpdatesListCorrectly is flaky #56826
  • Replace usage of IVsTextManager4.GetUserPreferences4 with free-threaded alternative #56815
    17.1
  • API Proposal: GeneratedKind.SourceGenerator #56810
    17.1
  • Synthesized delegate types do not include BeginInvoke() or EndInvoke() #56808
    17.1
  • Duplicated project when reading sln when multiple TargetPlatforms are specified #56806
  • How to properly use nullable analysis attributes for a method that validates an object properties #56800

Closed

  • CS8620, CS8634 mis-firing on extension method invocation with implied generic type args #56788
    17.0
  • Custom equality operator in generic expressions provoke BadImageFormatExceptions #56376
    17.0
  • Tool to help locating C# global code causing CS7022 for the real Main() #54950
  • Error CS8032 An instance of analyzer System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.JsonSourceGenerator cannot be created from (...) #56738
  • `StackAllocArrayCreationExpressionSyntax.Update` does not account for the `stackAllocKeyword` parameter #56740
    17.1
  • Compiler raising CS1513 & 1514 in response to file scoped namespace on .NET6 RC1 using VS2019 16.11.3 Preview 1.0 #56542
  • CS0121 Compilation error with .NET 6 and delegates #56807
    17.0.P5
  • DoesNotReturn isn't enforced on local functions #52598
    17.0.P5
  • Nullable analysis of non-returning local functions #45814
    17.0.P5
  • Local functions don't report warnings for NotNull/NotNullWhen/NotNullIfNotNull #47896
    17.0.P5
  • Report warnings from nullable analysis of lambda expressions with attributes #52827
    17.0.P5
  • Compiler error message with unresolved parameter placeholders in VS2019 16.11: "ENC0088 Modifying the body of '{0}' will prevent the debug session from continuing due to internal error: {1}" #55863
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid UI dependency in CloudCache by passing along the solution folder #56829
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56822
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Require the platform cache service in our package to ensure it's included when we are installed #56820
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.0.P5
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1391151 #56817
    auto-merge
  • Enable async lightbulbs in 17.0 #56816
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, Needs UX Triage
  • Account for a ref returning lambda as a local variable initializer. #56814
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Port perf fix to release/dev17.0 #56805
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Approved to merge, 17.0
  • Analysis of attributes in conversions of lambdas #56792
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.1
  • See through ref pointer indirection when optimizing stack locals #56790
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Fix null type argument inference with T? #56789
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.0

    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

    Area-IDE, Next

  • Concurrency issue with fixed fields #56581

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Trigger custom event 'BlazorLoaded' so we can hook into the event with JavaScript #37074
  • Route to Blazor components from angular App. #37073
  • Question: Blazor WebAssembly project template in .Net 6, no more main method? #37072
    Discussions
  • Question, is it possible to override Identity DefaultUI in a Razor class library #37071
  • Startup regression: fortunes_ef #37070
  • Blazor - Binding / ValueExpression (Method as Binding) #37068
  • Blazor - The input is flickered while typing speedy into the input in azure hosted #37067
  • Blazor does not free up memory #37066
  • [App-building][rc1]Error message is confusing, when there is a syntax error in razor file #37065
  • ConsumesAttribute on operation (with AllowAnonymousAttribute) returns 401 instead of 415 (due to default/fallback authorization policy) #37064
  • Blazor input type datetime-local doesn't trigger @onchange in Firefox #37062
  • Blazor virtualize handle drag and drop event on deleted item #37061
  • .NET 6 gRPC project templates use gRPC.Tools NuGet package which does not work on Big Sur #37060
  • Usage of IViewLocalizer with Html.PartialAsync #37058
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext #37055
  • Startup improvement: mvc #37054
  • Perf regression: fortunes_actix #37053
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, plaintext #37052
  • Removal of DefaultViewCompilerProvider in RC1 breaks AddRazorRuntimeCompilation in previous version libraries #37049
  • dotnet watch: Ctrl-C doesn't reset the terminal echo on Mac #37047
  • WebApplication does not react to appsettings.json changes #37046
    6.0.0
  • DateOnly and TimeOnly are displayed as complex objects in open-api schemas rather simple string #37045
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Blazor enable dynamic root components / Error: Dynamic root components have not been enabled in this application #37075
  • Brotli compression + disable response buffering for plain text yields incorrect response body #36960
    6.0.0
  • Blazor WASM apps being blocked by firewalls due to .NET assemblies, even after renaming DLLs #31048
    6.0-rc2
  • Startup regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper #37026
  • Using Speech with Blazor Wasm hosted App (.NET 6 RC1) #37063
  • Visual Studio 2022 Preview fail to activate Razor Language Server Client #35306
    17.0-Preview5
  • OpenIdConnectHandler and PAR (Pushed Authorization Requests) #37059
  • Blazor WebAssembly: Link that opens page in new tab causes freeze in original page (in Edge browser) #28577
    Backlog
  • OpenApi generator fails with space in path #33463
    Backlog
  • ReadyToRun Compilation with runtime win-x64 gives error - NETSDK1095: Optimizing assemblies for performance is not supported for the selected target platform or architecture. #37034
  • Blazor tooling fails to work with nested Global.json #33532
    17.0-Preview5
  • Perf regression: plaintext #37025
  • Razor tag auto-completion still auto-closes if a tag already has an end-tag. #36125
    17.0-Preview5
  • Update to stable LanguageSErver.Client.Implementation assembly #36945
    17.0-Preview5
  • [dotnet-sdk-6.0.100-rc.1.21424.13] SCF Failed to launch after retargetting to .NET 6.0 #35985
    6.0.0
  • Intellisense in editor window introduces unwanted tag between tags for razor component #36906
    17.0-Preview5
  • Generic inherits breaks smart indentation #35780
    17.0-Preview5
  • ngen O# assemblies #36554
    17.0-Preview5

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Fix UI issues for org auth login nav #37069
    area-mvc, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix event name of RequestLog #37044
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.0
  • Fix event name of RequestLog #37043

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • File -> New in IDE creates a .sln without the correct Deploy Configuration #2746
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] Image clipping and sizing doesn't match Xamarin.Forms #2745
  • [Bug] [WinUI] "Element Not Found" thrown when changing Window Size #2744
  • [Bug] Android Image Aspect issues #2741
  • Make MAUI AOT profile the default for MAUI Apps in Release configurations #2740
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] [Android] Screen orientation not getting locked #2739
  • [Spec] Introduce Actions and remove Events and Commands properties from controls #2733
  • [Bug] Childs inside Stacklayout not layout properly #2732
  • [Bug] In Entry the textchanged event doesn't work #2719

Closed

  • [Bug] Cannot deploy Maui. Net Blazor App to Windows, files missing from build #2447
  • [Bug] Non-Windows csproj hardcoded OutputPath causes build failure #2425
  • Remove references to Reloadify3000 #2524
  • MSB4057 The target "StaticWebAssetsPrepareForRun" does not exist in the project. #2609
  • Ensure dotnet new Maui builds on non windows full msbuild Cli #2165
    6.0.101-preview.9
  • Improve AppVersion single project manifest support #1662
    6.0.101-preview.9

PullRequests

Created

  • [workload] collapse platform-specific packs into fewer packs #2743
  • [Windows] Port CursorPosition for Entry handler #2742
  • [Windows] Add VerticalTextAlignment to SearchBar #2738
  • [Android] Add VerticalTextAlignment to Label #2737
  • [Android,Windows] Add VerticalTextAligment to Editor #2723

Merged

  • Update Maui.Graphics and SkiaSharp #2734
    area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.101-preview.9
  • Remove very old package reference #2736
  • Add sample code for Entry TextAlignment #2735
  • Add spacing for shields in README.md #2718
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #2717
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android,IOS] Update picker TextColor #2708

Updated

  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
  • Minimal changes required to support RemoteWebView #2469
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Generate the Windows manifests as well #2704
    area/single project ☝️
  • Update Android Gallery to use Maui #1558
    6.0.101-preview.9
  • Make shimmed Frame work on Android/Windows #2677
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.101-preview.9
  • [android] enable status bar customization #2049
  • Use Essentials over the old Device class #2488
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • Remove usage of IsolatedStorage #2710
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • Start to remove old things in Maui #2266
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • Remove IPlatformServices.GetHash #2707
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • Add ApplicationHandler #2653
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • Update the W A SDK #2668
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Confirm that the tests are broken #1511
